wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Edwards (born 24 May 1969) is a British former alpine skier. He competed in the slalom at the 1992 Winter Olympics, but did not finish.

response: Steve, Steven or Stephen Edwards may refer to:
*Stephen Edwards (alpine skier) (born 1969), former British alpine skier
*Stephen Edwards (composer) (born 1972), American film and TV composer; see Showdown (1993 film)
